local_intent: Ensure t_block is visible, move above with 3cm clearance, align, set yaw to 90, and verify orientation.
assumptions: 3 cm clearance is safe for approach
coherence_with_global: Replicates the global perception fallback (visibility check with raster scan retries), then performs DetectObject, MoveAbove, and ApproachAndAlign. Sets TCP yaw to 90 to align push normal and verifies orientation, consistent with the global plan prior to push.
